divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed the Moon was bright I looked out the window. saw a Bright star to my left of the moon. I then noticed an object move from right to left. I was rooftop level. size of an small car. It had blinking lights. Red, Green and yellow. with one red light on the tail. I moved and I followed it to the back of the house it moved over the house and dissappeared. no noise. I know when they come near me. I went to sleep
Summary: looked at moon and saw an object move at roof level go by, it was a triangle objeft.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around September 27th 2009
